mapper.insert: INSERT INTO articles( article_title, article_avrPrice, article_maxPrice, article_minPrice, article_maxImgStr, article_minImgStr, article_maxArticleTitle, article_minArticleTitle, article_count, chartDomain_firstX, chartDomain_secondX, chartDomain_thirdX, chartDomain_fourthX, chartData_firstY, chartData_secondY, chartData_thirdY, chartData_fourthY) VALUE(#{itemTitle}, #{avrItemPrice}, #{maxItemPrice}, #{minItemPrice}, #{maxImgSrc}, #{minImgSrc}, #{maxArticleTitle}, #{minArticleTitle}, #{articleCount}, #{chartDomain_firstX}, #{chartDomain_secondX}, #{chartDomain_thirdX}, #{chartDomain_fourthX}, #{chartData_firstY}, #{chartData_secondY}, #{chartData_thirdY}, #{chartData_fourthY});
